CustomField.description:
Desired username pattern. You can use special variables such as {!RANDOM} to insert a 4 digit random number:
qauser-{!RANDOM}@copado.com or qauser@copado.com.user{!RANDOM}
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Desired username pattern. You can use special variables such as {!RANDOM} to insert a 4 digit random number:
qauser-{!RANDOM}@copado.com or qauser@copado.com.user{!RANDOM}
CustomField.label: Username
